Spellbooks.Name: Adhere
Description: An object is covered in extremely sticky slime.
Personality: Adjacent objects stick to the book with great force.

Spellbooks.Name: Anchor
Description: A strong wire sprouts from your arms, affixing itself to two points within 50ft on each side.
Personality: If a rope is pulled through the iron loop on its spine, it becomes as heavy as an elephant.

Spellbooks.Name: Animate Object
Description: An object obeys your commands as best it can.
Personality: Moldable like clay. Childish laughter sprouts from its pages.

Spellbooks.Name: Anthropomorphize
Description: An animal either gains human intelligence or human appearance for one day.
Personality: Whimpers, purrs and growls depending on its treatment.

Spellbooks.Name: Arcane Eye
Description: You can see through a magical floating eyeball that flies around at your command.
Personality: Needs a spritz of water to open.

Spellbooks.Name: Astral Prison
Description: An object is frozen in time and space within an invulnerable crystal shell.
Personality: Silent, abstract, faces scream in anguish within.

Spellbooks.Name: Attract
Description: Two objects are strongly magnetically attracted to each other if they come within 10 feet.
Personality: Nearby compasses spin uselessly.

Spellbooks.Name: Auditory Illusion
Description: You create illusory sounds that seem to come from a direction of your choice.
Personality: Produces random and occasionally inopportune sounds throughout the day.

Spellbooks.Name: Babble
Description: A creature must loudly and clearly repeat everything you think. It is otherwise mute.
Personality: When the text is read aloud, the words of others become unintelligible.

Spellbooks.Name: Bait Flower
Description: A plant sprouts from the ground that emanates the smell of decaying flesh.
Personality: Attracts flies.

Spellbooks.Name: Beast Form
Description: You and your possessions transform into a mundane animal.
Personality: Covered in thick fur, its edges lined with small teeth.

Spellbooks.Name: Befuddle
Description: A creature of your choice is unable to form new short-term memories for the duration of the spell.
Personality: Its contents shift and change each time it is opened.

Spellbooks.Name: Body Swap
Description: You switch bodies with a creature you touch. If one body dies, the other dies as well.
Personality: The front cover shows an image of the last creature to read it.

Spellbooks.Name: Charm
Description: A creature you can see treats you as a friend.
Personality: Warm to the touch, and smells of roses.

Spellbooks.Name: Command
Description: A target obeys a single three-word command that does not cause it harm.
Personality: Grows thinner over time, until finally disappearing forever.

Spellbooks.Name: Comprehend
Description: You become fluent in all languages for a short while.
Personality: Drips letters, staining whatever it touches.

Spellbooks.Name: Cone of Foam
Description: Dense foam sprays from your hand, coating the target.
Personality: Spongy and moist with a soapy residue.

Spellbooks.Name: Control Plants
Description: Nearby plants and trees obey you and gain the ability to move at a slow pace.
Personality: Leaves grow along the spine, and it smells faintly of decay.

Spellbooks.Name: Control Weather
Description: You may alter the type of weather at will, but you do not otherwise control it.
Personality: Highly resistant to fire and water damage.

Spellbooks.Name: Cure Wounds
Description: Restore 1d4 STR per day to a creature you can touch.
Personality: Smells of vinegar and thyme. Turns red after use.

Spellbooks.Name: Deafen
Description: All nearby creatures are deafened.
Personality: Nearby instruments occasionally sound off, as if in protest.

Spellbooks.Name: Detect Magic
Description: You can see or hear nearby magical auras.
Personality: Becomes warm to the touch if magic is used nearby.

Spellbooks.Name: Disassemble
Description: Any of your body parts may be detached and reattached at will, without causing pain or damage. You can still control them.
Personality: Regenerates any torn or defaced pages.

Spellbooks.Name: Disguise
Description: You may alter the appearance of one character at will as long as they remain humanoid. Attempts to duplicate other characters will seem uncanny.
Personality: The surface makes a perfect mirror.

Spellbooks.Name: Displace
Description: An object appears to be up to 15ft from its actual position.
Personality: Bits of string, clothing, and leaves are sometimes stuffed inside.

Spellbooks.Name: Earthquake
Description: The ground begins shaking violently. Structures may be damaged or collapse.
Personality: Sand dribbles from the corners, seemingly without stop.

Spellbooks.Name: Elasticity
Description: Your body can stretch up to 10ft.
Personality: Smells of taffy, and is very flexible.

Spellbooks.Name: Elemental Wall
Description: A straight wall of ice or fire 50ft long and 10ft high rises from the ground.
Personality: Skin and warmer substances stick to it after use.

Spellbooks.Name: Filch
Description: A visible item teleports to your hands.
Personality: An ally's prized possession may occasionally be found tucked between its covers.

Spellbooks.Name: Fish Lung
Description: A target can breathe underwater until they surface again.
Personality: Smells strongly of the sea. Attracts wild animals.

Spellbooks.Name: Flare
Description: A bright ball of energy fires a trail of light into the sky, revealing your location to friend or foe.
Personality: Faintly glows in complete darkness.

Spellbooks.Name: Fog Cloud
Description: A dense fog spreads out from you.
Personality: When submersed in water, the book eventually turns all the liquid to vapor.

Spellbooks.Name: Frenzy
Description: A nearby creature erupts in a frenzy of violence.
Personality: Rough, sandpaper cover that destroys any book it touches.

Spellbooks.Name: Gate
Description: A portal to a random plane opens.
Personality: A large hole is carved into the center, ending in a void. Items dropped within are never seen again.

Spellbooks.Name: Gravity Shift
Description: You can change the direction of gravity, but only for yourself.
Personality: Attaches itself to the largest object nearby.

Spellbooks.Name: Greed
Description: A creature develops the overwhelming urge to possess a visible item of your choice.
Personality: The cover changes depending on the owner, subtly hinting at their deepest desires.

Spellbooks.Name: Haste
Description: Your movement speed is tripled.
Personality: Pages flip wildly while open. Can cause paper cuts.

Spellbooks.Name: Hatred
Description: A creature develops a deep hatred of another creature or group and wishes to destroy them.
Personality: Long term exposure to the book can cause suspicion, paranoia and distrust of others.

Spellbooks.Name: Hear Whispers
Description: You can hear faint sounds clearly.
Personality: The reader's voice is amplified for a short period of time afterwards.

Spellbooks.Name: Hover
Description: An object hovers, frictionless, 2ft above the ground. It can hold up to one humanoid.
Personality: Floats if dropped.

Spellbooks.Name: Hypnotize
Description: A creature enters a trance and will truthfully answer one yes or no question you ask it.
Personality: Eye-catching, swirling spirals don its covers.

Spellbooks.Name: Icy Touch
Description: A thick ice layer spreads across a touched surface, up to 10ft in radius.
Personality: Gloves required. Nonflammable.

Spellbooks.Name: Identify Owner
Description: Letters appear over the object you touch, spelling out the name of the object’s owners, if there are any.
Personality: The book's interior lists the name of its previous owner.

Spellbooks.Name: Illuminate
Description: A floating light moves as you command.
Personality: When held in light, the pages become a prism of vibrant rainbows.

Spellbooks.Name: Invisible Tether
Description: Two objects within 10ft of each other cannot be moved more than 10ft apart.
Personality: Its pages are not attached by glue or thread, yet stay together nonetheless.

Spellbooks.Name: Knock
Description: A nearby mundane or magical lock unlocks loudly.
Personality: Locked. A new owner 'produces' the key after their next meal.

Spellbooks.Name: Leap
Description: You jump up to 10ft high, once.
Personality: When thrown, it just keeps going.

Spellbooks.Name: Liquid Air
Description: The air around you becomes swimmable.
Personality: Floats of its own volition, bouncing off of whatever it touches.

Spellbooks.Name: Magic Dampener
Description: All nearby magical effects have their effectiveness halved.
Personality: Relics within 100ft of the spellbook cannot be recharged.

Spellbooks.Name: Manse
Description: A sturdy, furnished cottage appears for hours. You can permit and forbid entry to it at will.
Personality: If left inside, both the book and the cottage vanish forever.

Spellbooks.Name: Marble Craze
Description: Your pockets are full of marbles and will refill every 30 seconds.
Personality: When jostled, makes a playful rattling sound.

Spellbooks.Name: Masquerade
Description: A character's appearance and voice becomes identical to those of a character you touch.
Personality: Extended use causes the owner to develop unconscious yet noticeable tics.

Spellbooks.Name: Miniaturize
Description: A creature you touch is shrunk down to the size of a mouse.
Personality: The text is ludicrously, comically large.

Spellbooks.Name: Mirror Image
Description: An illusory duplicate of yourself appears and is under your control.
Personality: Over time, the owner begins to question who is the original, and who is the duplicate.

Spellbooks.Name: Mirrorwalk
Description: A mirror becomes a gateway to another mirror that you looked into today.
Personality: Will not open unless the owner politely knocks on the cover.

Spellbooks.Name: Multiarm
Description: You temporarily gain an extra arm.
Personality: After use, the caster is wracked with phantom limb syndrome for a day.

Spellbooks.Name: Night Sphere
Description: A 50ft-wide sphere of darkness displaying the night sky appears before you.
Personality: Displays a prominent constellation on its cover.

Spellbooks.Name: Objectify
Description: You become any inanimate object between the size of a grand piano and an apple.
Personality: The owner experiences intense pareidolia for days after use.

Spellbooks.Name: Ooze Form
Description: You become a living jelly.
Personality: Slowly drips an acid that eventually eats away anything it touches.

Spellbooks.Name: Pacify
Description: A creature near you has an aversion to violence.
Personality: Smells of jasmine and incense. Attracts children.

Spellbooks.Name: Phobia
Description: A nearby creature becomes terrified of an object of your choice.
Personality: Over time, haunting, abstract art begins to fill its pages.

Spellbooks.Name: Pit
Description: A pit 10ft wide and 10ft deep opens in the ground.
Personality: A standard piton can be safely stored in its spine.

Spellbooks.Name: Primal Surge
Description: A creature rapidly evolves into a future version of its species.
Personality: The owner is haunted by strange visions of their own ancestors.

Spellbooks.Name: Push/Pull
Description: An object of any size is pulled directly towards you or pushed directly away from you with the strength of one man.
Personality: Any force against the book is comically amplified.

Spellbooks.Name: Raise Dead
Description: A skeleton rises from the ground to serve you. They are incredibly stupid and can only obey simple orders.
Personality: The owner becomes more and more fascinated with bones after each use.

Spellbooks.Name: Raise Spirit
Description: The spirit of a nearby corpse manifests and will answer 1 question.
Personality: The answers (but not their questions) are forever inscribed in its pages.

Spellbooks.Name: Read Mind
Description: You can hear the surface thoughts of nearby creatures.
Personality: Long-term possession can cause the reader to mistake the thoughts of others as their own.

Spellbooks.Name: Repel
Description: Two objects are strongly magnetically repelled from each other within 10 feet.
Personality: Closed by two powerful straps that spring open at inopportune times.

Spellbooks.Name: Scry
Description: You can see through the eyes of a creature you touched earlier today.
Personality: The owner's eyes turn milky-white for an hour after use.

Spellbooks.Name: Sculpt Elements
Description: Inanimate material behaves like clay in your hands.
Personality: Slowly decays on contact with wood or cloth. Bury in dirt or submerge in water to refresh.

Spellbooks.Name: Sense
Description: Choose one kind of object (key, gold, arrow, jug, etc). You can sense the nearest example.
Personality: The book's previous owner is always aware of the book's current location.

Spellbooks.Name: Shield
Description: A creature you touch is protected from mundane attacks for one minute.
Personality: Bound in rusty ring-mail and is quite heavy. If held, provides +1 Armor.

Spellbooks.Name: Shroud
Description: A creature you touch is invisible until they move.
Personality: Invisible to any but the book's current owner.

Spellbooks.Name: Shuffle
Description: Two creatures you can see instantly switch places.
Personality: If stolen but not yet read, it reappears wherever its owner last left it.

Spellbooks.Name: Sleep
Description: A creature you can see falls into a light sleep.
Personality: Soft as a pillow, but yields only fitful sleep.

Spellbooks.Name: Slick
Description: Every surface in a 30ft radius becomes extremely slippery.
Personality: Gloves are required for handling, lest the book is dropped in a most comical fashion.

Spellbooks.Name: Smoke Form
Description: Your body becomes a living smoke that you can control.
Personality: Smells of campfire. The pages cannot be burnt, but are very sensitive to moisture.

Spellbooks.Name: Sniff
Description: You can smell even the faintest traces of scents.
Personality: Expresses a strong odor detectable only by its owner.

Spellbooks.Name: Snuff
Description: The source of any mundane light you can see is instantly snuffed out.
Personality: If left in one place for long periods, nearby light sources eventually dim, then finally go out.

Spellbooks.Name: Sort
Description: Inanimate items sort themselves according to categories you set.
Personality: Rights itself when dropped or thrown.

Spellbooks.Name: Skillful Repair
Description: You make minor repairs to a nonliving object.
Personality: Sewn from the vellum of one hundred books, no two pages are alike.

Spellbooks.Name: Spellsaw
Description: A whirling blade flies from your chest, clearing any plant material in its way. It is otherwise harmless.
Personality: Wrapped in stained leather, it should be oiled at least once a month.

Spellbooks.Name: Spider Climb
Description: You can climb surfaces like a spider.
Personality: New cobwebs must be pushed aside prior to each use. They are hard to remove.

Spellbooks.Name: Swarm
Description: You become a swarm of crows, rats, or piranhas. You can only be harmed by blast attacks.
Personality: Easily broken into a dozen distinct parts that slowly move towards one another over time.

Spellbooks.Name: Telekinesis
Description: You may mentally 1 move item under 60lbs.
Personality: The owner can summon the book through mental command alone (WIL save or become deprived afterwards).

Spellbooks.Name: Telepathy
Description: Two creatures can hear each other’s thoughts, no matter how far apart.
Personality: The holder can hear (but not respond) to the thoughts of whoever last possessed it, and vice versa.

Spellbooks.Name: Teleport
Description: An object or person you can see is transported from one place to another in a 50ft radius.
Personality: Can be destroyed to create a portal to another dimension.

Spellbooks.Name: Target Lure
Description: An object you touch becomes the target of any nearby spell.
Personality: Attracts all manner of magical creatures, spell leaks, and scrying.

Spellbooks.Name: Thicket
Description: A thicket of trees and dense brush up to 50ft wide suddenly sprouts up.
Personality: Wrapped in vines that must be destroyed again with each use.

Spellbooks.Name: Passage
Description: Creates a temporary path through wood, stone or brick.
Personality: An object dropped on top of the book inevitably falls through the other side.

Spellbooks.Name: Time Control
Description: Time in a 50ft bubble slows down or increases by 10% for 30 seconds.
Personality: Alternates its appearance as either impossibly old or freshly written.

Spellbooks.Name: True Sight
Description: You see through all nearby illusions.
Personality: Cannot be concealed by magic, and sticks out like a sore thumb.

Spellbooks.Name: Upwell
Description: A spring of seawater appears.
Personality: Hardened leather bindings caked in salt and living barnacles.

Spellbooks.Name: Vision
Description: You completely control what a creature sees.
Personality: An unnerving, lidless eye graces the front cover.

Spellbooks.Name: Visual Illusion
Description: A silent, immobile, room-sized illusion of your choice appears.
Personality: Filled with rich, colorful pages very much like a children's bedtime story.

Spellbooks.Name: Ward
Description: A silver circle 50ft across appears on the ground. Choose one species that cannot cross it.
Personality: The covers are decorated with bizarre, otherworldly creatures with thousands of eyes.

Spellbooks.Name: Web
Description: Your wrists shoot thick webbing.
Personality: The text is alien, yet somehow intelligible, for it is the language of dreams.

Spellbooks.Name: Widget
Description: A primitive version of a drawn tool or item appears before you and disappears after a short time.
Personality: Smells of iron and rust, sweat and effort. Faint sounds of harsh labor emanate from deep within its pages.

Spellbooks.Name: Wizard Mark
Description: Your finger can shoot a stream of ulfire-colored paint. This paint is only visible to you and can be seen at any distance, even through solid objects.
Personality: Inside the front cover is a small pocket containing a thin pad of paper, listing the name and date of death of all previous owners.

Spellbooks.Name: X-Ray Vision
Description: You can see through walls, dirt, clothing, etc.
Personality: Long-term exposure can cause hair loss, blurry vision, and fatigue.
